message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal use. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you for $15000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and my budget.
